name: Codeigniter multiple checkbox check helper
body:
### Welcome to nu1ww Pages.
The helper function takes four parameters: (name, array of data, the array what we need to select, ’ you can post any attribute of check box’  )

```
$ cd nu1ww/ci_multiple_checkbox
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Example usage:

 `$all =array( 0 => 'Nuwan', 1 => 'Ruby', 2 => 'Safi',  3 => 'Nima' ); 
$selected = array( 1 => 'Ruby', 2 => 'Safi') ;
$name='name_of_checkbox';
echo  form_multiple_checkbox($name, $all, $selected, $extra = ''); `
